alert.note: Alert for Lower St. Martin; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 5:39PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Iberia and central St. Martin Parishes through 615 PM CDT... At 539 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northwest of Bayou Sorrel, or 12 miles east of Catahoula, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Belle River and Pierre Part. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower St. Martin; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin
